meanings.definition: The act of installing something before its intended use.
meanings.sent1: The preinstallation of the software saved time during the setup process.
meanings.sent2: The preinstallation of the security system was completed by the technicians.
meanings.sent3: The preinstallation of the new carpet made the room look like a construction site.
meanings.sent4: Her meticulous preinstallation of the decorations transformed the venue into a festive space.
meanings.sent5: The preinstallation of the lights made the stage glow with a warm ambiance.

meanings.definition: Something that is installed before its intended use.
meanings.sent1: The preinstallation was a thoughtful step in ensuring the smooth operation of the machinery.
meanings.sent2: The preinstallation of the plumbing fixtures was essential for the building's functionality.
meanings.sent3: The preinstallation of the playground equipment brought joy to the children even before it was officially open.
meanings.sent4: The preinstallation of the alarm system acted as a silent guardian for the property.
meanings.sent5: The preinstallation of the heating system kept the house warm during the cold winter nights.
